item.title: Simone Fischer-Hübner's Honorary Doctorate Lecture: Challenges of User-centric Privacy Enhancing Technologies
item.description:
Who: Prof. Simone Fischer-Hübner\ When: 16:30–17:00 on Friday {{ page.date | date_to_long_string }}.\ Other honorary doctors will speak before and after Simone - feel free to attend the whole event 4pm-6pm! (If you attend in person, please do come at 4pm.)\ Where: Chalmersska huset\ (limited seats, register via events@chalmers.se to attend in person)\ Where (online): on YouTube\ Title: Challenges of User-centric Privacy Enhancing Technologies

Abstract:\ {{ page.teaser }}

Further info on the event in English and in Swedish.
